headline.main: Postpartum Depression: What to Expect When the Unexpected Happens

docs.abstract: I was 34, and my son just a few months old, on the morning I called my husband at his new job and asked him to come drive me to the Emergency Room.
docs.snippet: I was 34, and my son just a few months old, on the morning I called my husband at his new job and asked him to come drive me to the Emergency Room.

docs.lead_paragraph: In Type 2 diabetics, the pancreas’s beta cells work harder to produce insulin, and it was believed they eventually died. Now research in mice suggests they may be reverting to a precursor state.

headline.seo: Under Stress, Insulin-Making Cells Revert to Nascent State
headline.main: High Stress Can Make Insulin Cells Regress
headline.print_headline: High Stress Can Make Insulin Cells Regress

docs.abstract: Scientists have long struggled to understand why beta cells in the pancreas eventually lose their ability to produce insulin in Type 2 diabetics; Columbia University study in journal Cell suggests that when mice are subjected to physiological stress, their beta cells can revert to an earlier developmental state in which they no longer produce the hormone.
docs.snippet: In Type 2 diabetics, the pancreas’s beta cells work harder to produce insulin, and it was believed they eventually died. Now research in mice suggests they may be reverting to a precursor state.

headline.print_headline: A Possible Price to Pay if Doctors Spurn Insurance

docs.abstract: Private health insurance used to be the ticket to a doctor's appointment. Now, many physicians no longer accept insurance and require upfront payment from patients.
docs.snippet: Private health insurance used to be the ticket to a doctor's appointment. Now, many physicians no longer accept insurance and require upfront payment from patients.

headline.main: Vaginal Delivery Safe for Most Preterm Babies
headline.print_headline: Vital Signs: Childbirth: Support for Vaginal Preterm Deliveries

docs.abstract: An analysis found no difference in neonatal deaths of headfirst babies whether the mother attempted a vaginal delivery or had a Caesarean section.
docs.snippet: An analysis found no difference in neonatal deaths of headfirst babies whether the mother attempted a vaginal delivery or had a Caesarean section.

headline.print_headline: Vital Signs: Risks:Pregnancy Complications May Have a Past

docs.abstract: Women who were born prematurely have a higher risk of pregnancy complications, a new study has found.
docs.snippet: Women who were born prematurely have a higher risk of pregnancy complications, a new study has found.

headline.main: Yahoo Chief Marissa Mayer Welcomes New Baby Boy
headline.print_headline: It’s a Boy for Yahoo’s C.E.O., Who Will Continue to Lead

docs.abstract: Marissa Mayer, Yahoo's chief executive, gave birth to a baby boy on Sunday. Ms. Mayer has said she plans to return to work within two weeks and work remotely during her maternity leave. A Yahoo spokeswoman confirmed the birth on Monday morning.
docs.snippet: Marissa Mayer, Yahoo's chief executive, gave birth to a baby boy on Sunday. Ms. Mayer has said she plans to return to work within two weeks and work remotely during her maternity leave. A Yahoo spokeswoman confirmed the birth on Monday morning.
